name: Takashi Abiko
body:
# COMPUTER SOFTWARE
* ArcGIS Desktop 10.2: ArcMap, ArcScene, ArcGlobe, ArcCatalog, 3D Analyst, Geostatistical Analyst, Spatial Analyst

* Quantum GIS (Open Source GIS)

* Micro Images TNTmips (Map and Image Processing System)

* GST Mapper (GeoSpatial Technologies, Inc.), the emergency response navigation systems for CAL FIRE mobile data computers

* Open Street Map and JOSM Editor (Open Source GIS)

* Open Source graphic design programs – GIMP and Inkscape

* GitHub – Web-based repository with version control and source code management, utilizing Markdown code language

* Google Earth - Utilizing KMZ and KML files

* Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, Publisher, PowerPoint

* Adobe: Illustrator, Dreamweaver, Photoshop

#[Technical Experience Next](http://tabiko.github.io/Technical-Experience/)
###[Takashi Abiko Home](http://tabiko.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
